cmd.description: Command itself. Could be decimal number or string with hexadecimal notation: "0x10".
cmd.name: Command

dst.description: Destination for command. Could be decimal number or string with hexadecimal notation: "0x10".
dst.name: Destination

raw.description: Raw CEC command in format "00:00:00:00" where first two digits are source and destination, second byte is command and optional other bytes are command parameters. If raw command specified, other params are ignored.
raw.name: Raw

src.description: Source of command. Could be decimal number or string with hexadecimal notation: "0x10".
src.name: Source

standby.description: Places in standby all devices which support this function.

volume.description: Increases or decreases the system volume.
volume.name: Volume
